channel.title: IELTS on Right directions for your academic goals
channel.description: Recent content in IELTS on Right directions for your academic goals

item.title: Stop Paying for IELTS Preparation
item.description: “STOP PAYING FOR IELTS PREPARATION AND LEARN FROM IELTS OWN STAFF” Its completely out of my understanding why people spend money to prepare for IELTS. I see a lot of people confused and worried about where should they prepare for IELTS test. Some take classes on-campus while some join skype sessions and pay large sum of cash for these services. I just want everyone to know that there is a free self-paced online course available on the internet which is designed by the academics of University of Queensland.
